turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about 1892 Vacaville–Winters earthquakes.
turn.1: where was the 1892 vacaville winters earthquake felt
turn.2: The furthest extent that they were felt was from Redding in the north to Salinas and Fresno in the south and to Virginia City, Nevada in the east.
turn.4: Investigators completed a study of the area that included a three dimensional crustal velocity model.
turn.6: Proprietary seismic reflection data were also scrutinized in an attempt to establish a source for the sequence.
turn.8: Observations of the range front and modelling of strong ground motions led to the presentation of a rupture on the west-dipping Gordon Valley blind thrust fault that could have produced the felt intensities that were specific to the April 19 event.
turn.10: The shocks affected Solano and Yolo Counties along the border of the Sacramento Valley.
turn.12: In the north, the communities of Esparto and Capay both experienced Mercalli intensities of VIII ("Severe") and in the south, Vacaville and Fairfield both experienced the same.
